title: New: RXY – Dystopia
body:
Citing Florence And The Machine, Cocorosie and Kate Bush as influences, London’s **RXY** doesn’t stray too far from these inspirations on her debut track.

_Dystopia_, is a journey through the aforementioned sounds, focusing heavily on the vocals of **Roxy Blake**, and the synth driven verses. ‘_I could live for a thousand years, if they went by on your wrist_‘ may well be one of the most eloquent declarations of love you’ll hear this year. Check out _Dystopia_ below, taken from **RXY’s** debut album _**Out Of Time And Into Space**_, out next week.
